-Heal to full HP and permanently gain +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and +1 EVD. This effect can only trigger once.

column3: Choose one of the following two effects to activate:\n1. This card becomes "Big Rocket Cannon".\n2. Deal 1 damage to target enemy. If KO'd, you gain wins as though KO'd in battle.
column4: Red Barrel... It's time to use that! -Marc

column3: Deal 3 damage to target enemy. If KO'd, you gain wins as though KO'd in battle.\nThis card becomes "Rocket Cannon" when you use another card or you suffer KO.
column4: Go! -Marc

column3: Roll a die and move result x 3 panels. Deal damage equal to the result to each unit you pass during the move. If they are KO'd by the damage, gain Wins as though from a normal battle. After this effect, your turn ends.
column4: I'll go fast and cut my way through! -Alicianrone

column3: When another player loses stars from an Encounter panel battle and those stars would go to the Encounter panel unit, you will receive them instead. If this effect is triggered, discard this card at the end of your turn. If several players carry Beast Witch, the stars are split between them.
column4: All beasts! Obey me! -Teotoratta

column3:
Gain one of the following effects depending on the top-of-the-deck card:
Event +3 ATK
Boost +3 DEF
Others +3 EVD
column4: I can see through everything! -Arnelle

column3: Gain +1 Rage Counter. Target another active unit and enter Raging Mode: gain +X ATK and +X EVD where X is the number of your Rage Counters. Raging Mode ends and Rage Counters become 0 upon target's KO. Gain +2 Wins if you KO target in battle, and -50% Stars and Wins if you KO any other unit.
column4: Gyaoooh! -Maynie

column3: Stock Effect (3). In a battle where you attack first, gain -1 ATK and +1 DEF for every 2 stock, and +1 ATK per stock. This effect can stack.
column4: I'm going to use my saint eyes! -Kyupita

column1: Chef, I Could Use Some Help!
column3: Summon Chef. Fights battles on behalf of your unit. Gives 2 Wins on KO. Gives stars gained in battle to your unit. Effect ends with Chef's KO. This card turns to "Manager, I Could Use Some Help!" if you have 4 or more Store Manager Counters and your Lvl is 4 or higher.
column4: Chef! I'm going to need your help! -Chris

column1: Manager, I Could Use Some Help!
column3: Summon Store Manager. Fights battles on behalf of your unit. Gives 2 Wins on KO. Gives stars gained in battle to your unit. Effect ends with Store Manager's KO, and your Store Manager Counters reset to 0. This card turns to "Chef, I Could Use Some Help!" if you have less than 4 Store Manager Counters.
column4: Manager, help me! -Chris

column3: Lose 5 stars at the start of each turn. Ignore Drop panels, traps, and card effect damage. This effect ends when you stop on your own Home panel or have less than 5 stars.
column4: Now, let's get going. -Halena

column3: Stock Effect.\nRoll 2 dice for everything except for battle. This effect ends when you stop on your own Home panel. Can only check Norma on own Home panel.
column4: *Cheep cheep*! Cook wants to go this way. -Cook

column3: ?Cost: 10 + 10x existing stack of Upshift. Stock Effect (2).\nGain +1 MOV. This effect can be stacked (max 6).\nIf you end your turn without moving to the end of your final move roll, lose a stack of Upshift.
column4: ...Don't follow me. -Lone Rider

column3: Gain Freight cards equal to your level. With Freight cards in your hand, this card can be played as a Battle card: During this battle, gain +1 ATK for every Freight card in your hand.
column4: Breaking the load regulations, you say? I have a permit right here! -Merchant

column3: If the opponent has not played a Battle card, give them a Freight card and cancel the battle. May only be used by the defender.\nWhen stopping on your Home panel, discard this card and gain 5 Stars.
column4: You may keep all that freight, yes you may. -Merchant

column3: On successful Evasion, deal damage to the opponent equal to what you would have taken from them.\nIf used by Hime (Moonlight) during full moon (every 5 chapters), deal double that damage but cannot use the Defend command.
column4: Now let us dance. -Hime

column3: Stock Effect: All opposing units randomly gain -1 ATK, DEF or EVD during their next battle.\nIf held by Fernet, this card can be transformed into "Affluence (1)" instead.
column4: Pleased to make your acquaintance. I hope we can get along well in the future. -Fernet

column3:
?Cost: (X) x10. If this card is Affluence (4):
Active players battle you in a random order. They gain -3 ATK. You cannot attack. If you are not KO'd, opponent gives you (their Lvl) x 10 stars.
If not Affluence (4): Upgrade this card.
If not held by Fernet, this card becomes New Nobility.
column4: You wish to ask me for a favor...? My my, of course I'd be ever so happy to help a friend. -Fernet

column3: ?Cost: Level x7\nEffect Duration: (Your Lvl) x Chapters\nTurn all Bonus and Draw panels into Encounter panels. If an enemy moves onto an Encounter panel with a Battle card you set as a Trap, they must stop on that panel.
column4: Look at all those countless planes crossing the sky... It's like watching a dream, is it not? -Malt

column3: During this battle, gain +1 ATK. Additionally, gain +X ATK where X is the damage you have taken during this battle.
column4: Stop bullying Daddy! -Mescal

column3: Place an Invasion trap on each Home panel that has no active trap.\nEach player will battle a robotic wild unit during their next 2 encounters, and this robotic unit will gain +1 ATK. This effect can stack.
column4: Everything's under my control. -Shifu

column3: Effect Duration: 3 Chapters.\nWhenever another player gains stars from a panel or battle KO, they gain up to your Lvl fewer stars, and you gain your Lvl stars. Effect expires on KO.
column4: Fufufu, look how many stars I have here. -Reika

column3: During this battle, gain +3 ATK.
column4: I'll commence... my vacation now. -Sora

column3: All allies gain a damage reduction of 2 during their next battle.
column4: Geez, you're going overboard. -Suguri

column3: Revive one KO'd ally with full HP.
column4: You're fine now. The pain's gone. -Hime

column3: During this battle, damage taken by both sides is doubled.
column4: Mimyuu! Who did this to you... -Tomato

column3: Throw a slimebomb on a panel around you (radius 3). All panels in 1 panel radius will be covered with Goo for 2 chapters.
column4: Pure goo in a bottle, ready to throw! -Alchemist

column3: Teleport on any panel, then play your turn.
column4: One sip, and poof! -Alchemist

column3: Throw a lure on a panel around you (radius 3). All panels around in 1 panel radius will turn into encounter panels for 3 chapters.
column4: The smell of this thing should be strong enough to attract most small fry around the place... -Alchemist

column3: Effect duration: 3 chapters\nHeal 1 HP every turn. The effect is removed upon getting KO'd, and cannot stack.
column4: No one can ever bake something better than this masterpiece. -Star Baker

column3: Heal 2 HP every turn until your next KO. The effect cannot stack.
column4: Fluffiness will conquer the world! -Sky Baker

column3: For this battle, gain 5 HP and +1 ATK, DEF, EVD.
column4: Fufufu, this pure water will cure your thirst, you have my word on it! -Innkeeper

column3: Forget your past mistakes and trigger a Bounty Battle. Can only be used on a panel with a discovered monster location. You must possess the bounty to start the battle. Your turn ends after playing this card.
column4: Don't let it run away! -Alchemist

column3: Effect Duration: 2 to 5 chapters\nAble to discern all monster locations for the duration of the effect.
column4: It will greatly ease your expedition... if it works long enough! -Armorer

column3: Effect Duration: 3 Chapters. Gain +2 DEF. The maximum stacks of Hardened Scales are increased to 10. If you gain 10 stacks of Hardened Scales, all other players suffer KO.
column4: Th-that's dangerous… I'm sorry. -Watty

column3: Effect duration: 3 Chapters Immune to instant KO effects. When staying on a panel with another player at the end of either player's turn, gain a copy of a random card in their hand. You can neither challenge nor be challenged; instead, opponents may stop to Pet you. Effect expires on KO.
column4: *Wimper* -Pomeranius
